sentences.sContent: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.sCn: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

sentences.sContent: ‘Do you need any help?’ ‘No. It’s under control , thanks.’
sentences.sCn: “你需要帮忙吗？”“不用，已经搞定了。谢谢。”

sentences.sContent: Dogs are allowed on the trails if they are kept under control .
sentences.sCn: 狗在受到看管的情况下可以在小径上走。

sentences.sContent: The car spun out of control and hit a tree.
sentences.sCn: 汽车失控打转，撞到了树上。

sentences.sContent: Flight delays do occur, for reasons that are outside our control .
sentences.sCn: 飞机延误的确会发生，其原因不是我们可以控制的。

synos.tran: [自]控制；[管理]管理；抑制；操纵装置

phrases.pCn: 处于控制之下；情况正常
控制组（自变量的一种处理方法）；实验对照组

words.tran: 受控制的；受约束的；克制的
可控制的；可管理的；能操纵的
主计员或管理员之职位或任期
控制；约束（control的过去式）；指挥

trans.tranCn: 控制；管理；抑制；操纵装置
trans.tranOther: the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want
to have the power to make the decisions about how a country, place, company etc is organized or what it does
